title: SitCom Mini-Intensive NYC 12.6.2015
desc: Sunday, December 6, 2015  2pm - 5pm  Ripley-Grier Studios, 520 8th Avenue, 16th floor, NYC, NY 10018 $105  | $95  for Maggie's Students/Clients/UNION & AGR members Pilot Season is upon us soon.? Be prepared. Laugh it up while gaining comedy confidence in your  On-Camera Sitcom Auditioning, Cold-Reading, & Comedy Skills.?  Cold readings of short comedy scenes plus script analysis tools that will help you with all your Comedy Auditioning concerns.??  You'll learn On-Camera Auditioning Skills that'll give you confidence in all your future On-Camera auditions, regardless of the genre.  Be ready with the tools that'll help you book during this Pilot Season,  especially for new shows like  Kevin James' new untitled Multi-Camera SitCom  coming to NYC in 2016.  You'll leave this Mini-Intensive feeling ready-to-go with your Auditioning & Cold Reading Skills  & with your SitCom Comedy Technique. Limited enrollment.? Sign-up today!?  http://YourSitComCoach.com ?  Questions?? Email: Info@YourSitComCoach.com or below.
